text: From my first visit, dr made me feel comfortable and confident in his expertise. His treatment plan, including therapy and lifestyle changes, has helped me feel so much better. Highly recommend to anyone suffering from back issues.

Dr is a very caring and patient doctor, not rushing to complete my session despite many patients outside. He is very meticulous in checking my symptoms and history. He provide options and clarification in different options for me to consider. Definitely going to make this my family doctor.

I came from Taiping to see Dr PainGone to treat my lumbar disease that has been causing me pain for 4 years. Other doctors told me to have surgery, but I didn't dare. So I came to listen to Dr Jack's opinion. He patiently explained and treated me. I just had one treatment and I feel 70-80% better

Best Doctor in town!
My mom suffered from back pain for 2 years and she went for multiple surgeries and operations but didn't help. Until we found Dr. He healed my mom after one operation like miracle! Thank you again for saving her life!

I have cervical and lower back issues since 2023 , even did surgery in hospital, however my symptoms not improved until I met Dr Wong in Dr Pain gone, Dr Wong just treated me for 2 sessions with his unique treatment method and now I am much improved and have a better lifestyle now. Thank you Dr Wong. Highly recommended.
